title: How to Make a Flash for a Phone
category_hierarchy: Digital Technology Art and Craft Projects

steps.headline: Cut the line to the wall in half (try on a sample line first, if you're not an electrician).
There should be 4 little wires inside.
steps.description: Cut one of those in half as well.

steps.headline: Strip it (to see real wire) and connect one side to one side of a light switch.
Connect the other side to the other end of the light switch.
steps.description: Now you can cut the line in a "flash".

text: Cut the line to the wall in half (try on a sample line first, if you're not an electrician).  There should be 4 little wires inside. Cut one of those in half as well. Strip it (to see real wire) and connect one side to one side of a light switch.  Connect the other side to the other end of the light switch. Now you can cut the line in a "flash".
